description:
Instructions say, "To use this package you need to install the proprietary dropbox package from https://www.dropbox.com/install".

Well, that package won't install because missing dependencies, so this one won't work for me.
summary: Missing dependencies in proprietary Dropbox package is = no go

description: It's OK, just doesn't start automatically but works great.
summary: Works, but have to start manually every time

description: Dropbox did no work on Kubuntu 22.04.lts. With net browserr like Firefox I can acces my dropbox account, but not in Dolphine even I have installed Caja Dropbox and Dropbox from Discover.
My ubuntu23.04 crash every time when I launch dropbox downloaded from officia website, but with this app it works.
Nach dem installieren von db läuft mein rechner unstabil. Fähr länger hoch. sofort löschen.
Me parece que esta bien a secas.
extension censée donner à la fois un menu contextuel dropbox et les icônes de statut des fichiers, mais sous XFCE avec caja la plus récente : pas de menu contextuel
summary: pas de menu contextuel sous XFCE

description: fonctionnel, plus commode que l'application web
